name: peterszerzo.com
description: Source code for my personal website.

scripts.start:site: npm run prep:site && NODE_ENV=development ELM_APP_MAIN=Site elm-app start
scripts.start:overeasy: npm run prep:overeasy && NODE_ENV=development ELM_APP_MAIN=OverEasy elm-app start
scripts.build:site: npm run prep:site && NODE_ENV=production ELM_APP_MAIN=Site elm-app build
scripts.build:overeasy: npm run prep:overeasy && NODE_ENV=production ELM_APP_MAIN=OverEasy elm-app build
scripts.deploy:overeasy: npm run build:overeasy && surge build overeasy.sh

author: Peter Szerzo <szerzo.peter@gmail.com>
